original: Niyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
Niyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: ▁ niyat añca ▁a niyat añca ▁dhammaṃ ▁paṭicca ▁na niyat o ▁dhammo ▁uppajjati ▁hetupaccayā ▁saṃkhittaṃ

original: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
